value.name: Mothers rally to pass police reform in George Floyd’s name
value.description: The Center for Racial Equity and Justice held a “Hear the Cry Rally” on May 6, days before Mother’s Day, at Freedom Plaza, asking mothers to gather in support of passing the George Floyd Justice
